sentences.en: A bigger objection is that aggregation of the results invites distortion.
sentences.cn: 一种更大的异议是把各种结果集中考虑容易导致曲解。

sentences.en: A much bigger battle is ahead for the president.
sentences.cn: 一场更为艰巨的战斗正等待着总统。

sentences.en: Cities, if unrestricted, tend to coalesce into bigger and bigger conurbations.
sentences.cn: 如果不加限制，城市往往会联合发展成越来越大的集合城市。

sentences.en: Do you have this dress in a bigger bust size?
sentences.cn: 有胸围比这件大些的衣服 吗 ?

sentences.en: Good posture also helps your bust look bigger.
sentences.cn: 优美的姿势也能让你的胸部看起来更丰满。

sentences.en: He hypoed his jeep's power by changing a bigger engine.
sentences.cn: 他为他的吉普车换了一个更大的发动机以增大其马力。

sentences.en: I shouldn't tangle with Peter, he is bigger than me.
sentences.cn: 我不应该与彼特吵架, 他的块头比我大.

sentences.en: I'm going to be surfing bigger waves when I get to Australia!
sentences.cn: 到了澳大利亚后我要去浪头更大的地方冲浪！

sentences.en: That uncertain thing was swelled bigger.
sentences.cn: 那个不知叫什么的东西膨胀得更大了。

sentences.en: The bigger children in the neighborhood molested the younger ones.
sentences.cn: 邻居家的大孩子欺负小孩子.

sentences.en: The bigger girls used to chase me and tickle me.
sentences.cn: 比我高大的女孩过去总是追赶着胳肢我。

sentences.en: The Irish love a party, the bigger the better.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰人喜欢聚会，规模越大越好。

sentences.en: Their house is very similar to ours, but ours is bigger.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子和我们的十分相像，但我们的要大些。

sentences.en: Their ship fell astern of the bigger one.
sentences.cn: 他们的船落到了一条更大的船的后面。

sentences.en: These squids are bigger than those I bought last week.
sentences.cn: 这些鱿鱼比我上周买的大.

sentences.en: We joined up small plots of land and made bigger fields.
sentences.cn: 我们把小块的地连成大块的田.

sentences.en: Yet bigger satellites will be sent up into orbit.
sentences.cn: 更为大型的卫星将被送入轨道。

sentences.en: You must trim your costs if you want to make bigger profits.
sentences.cn: 如果你想获得更大的利润,就必须削减开支.

trans.tran_cn: 大的，长大的，大的( big的比较级 )，重要的，（计划） 庞大的，大方的
